mapper.select: SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM ( SELECT g.payCode, usersCode FROM ${thema} g JOIN payment p ON g.payCode = p.payCode WHERE usersCode = #{usersCode} )

SELECT giftCode, endDate, useDate, payCode, g.goodsCode, goodsName, gubunName FROM gift g JOIN goods gs ON g.goodsCode = gs.goodsCode JOIN goodsGubun gg ON gs.gubunCode = gg.gubunCode WHERE giftCode = #{giftCode}

SELECT ticketCode, endDate, startDate, payCode, g.goodsCode, goodsName, gubunName FROM ticket g JOIN goods gs ON g.goodsCode = gs.goodsCode JOIN goodsGubun gg ON gs.gubunCode = gg.gubunCode WHERE ticketCode = #{ticketCode}
mapper.update: UPDATE gift SET useDate = #{useDate} WHERE giftCode = #{giftCode}
UPDATE ticket SET startDate = TO_DATE('0001-01-01','YYYY-MM-DD') WHERE ticketCode = #{ticketCode}
UPDATE goodsCount SET quantity = quantity-1 WHERE goodsCode = #{goodsCode}
mapper.select: SELECT quantity FROM goodsCount WHERE goodsCode = #{goodsCode}
